name: Ai-challenge-ants
tagline: ai-challenge.org , my quick attempt, applied reinforcement learning (from Berkeley's framework code from their assignment on Value iteration)
body:
Hello

This was my quick attempt at designing bots for aichallenge.org

The base algorithm I used was value iteration, modded base code provided by berkeley (http://inst.eecs.berkeley.edu/~cs188/pacman/projects/reinforcement/reinforcement.html)

The main file is anttools\myBot.py

Run any of the .bat files.

Enjoy :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
